title: Seigmen I Operaen - Seigmen in Opera - (Full Concert)(DVD-DL)
description:
DVD, officially released July 15, 2012.
Pre-orders were signed by the band and shipped around July 1, 2012.

 

On June 21st and 22nd 2008, Seigmen performed two unforgettable concerts from the stage in the new opera building as the very first Norwegian rock band. The shows were the culmination of a year with preparations, from the first contact with the opera, to the intense weeks and days beforehand. Those who were present got to experience a magic atmosphere and a band that explored all sides of its expression. Seldom have a Norwegian band embraced the opera's soul with more respect, and never before has the Norwegian opera experienced a greater energy discharge.

Transmission, with the producer Lars Martin KrÃ¦mer, followed Seigmen closely in the days before the concerts and filmed both nights. After a lot of pressure from the fans, these recordings were found and cut four years later. All available material has been examined and a lot of time and resources put down to recreate the atmosphere. Seigmen in Operaen is an authentic document of all the happened based on the material at hand and the way it was performed.

Preludium (52min)


Documentary from the Opera. We follow the band's preparations the days before the two big performances at the opera. At first we see the testing and preparations with the whole band and a few strings at the venue Parkteatret and then we see how the whole thing came together backstage and onstage at the opera including soundcheck and all the excitement. No subtitles.
